services.title: Automation
services.description: We enable enterprises to automate high-volume, repetitive tasks with intelligent digital workforce solutions, reducing cost and increasing efficiency.
services.detailed_description: Our Automation services leverage RPA, AI, and ML to streamline operations. We help businesses enhance productivity, eliminate manual errors, and reduce operational costs through intelligent automation platforms.

case_study.title: Streamlining Invoice Processing
case_study.summary: Implemented RPA to automate invoice processing, reducing processing time by 70% and minimizing errors.

services.title: Application Services
services.description: We design, build, and manage modern applications that drive agility, innovation, and business performance.
services.detailed_description: From cloud-native development to legacy modernization, we help you create secure, scalable, and user-friendly applications tailored to your business needs.

case_study.title: Modernizing E-commerce Platform
case_study.summary: Transformed a legacy e-commerce system into a cloud-native application, resulting in a 50% increase in user engagement.

services.cta_label: Explore your app needs with us

services.title: Business Process Services
services.description: We streamline and manage business operations using domain expertise, technology, and analytics to deliver better outcomes.
services.detailed_description: Our business process services use intelligent automation, analytics, and industry knowledge to optimize workflows and improve customer satisfaction.

case_study.title: Optimizing Payroll Processing
case_study.summary: Automated payroll processing for a multinational company, reducing errors by 90% and processing time by 60%.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: We help organizations define transformation strategies and implement change using technology, data, and innovation.
services.detailed_description: Our consultants work alongside you to create and implement digital transformation strategies backed by deep industry expertise, data science, and technology innovation.
benefits: Strategic alignment of IT and business goals

case_study.title: Driving Digital Transformation
case_study.summary: Developed a comprehensive digital transformation roadmap for a healthcare provider, leading to improved patient engagement and operational efficiency.

services.title: Quality Engineering & Assurance
services.description: We provide quality assurance across applications and platforms to help you deliver reliable and high-performance software.
services.detailed_description: Ensure product quality with our test automation, performance testing, and QA strategy services. We bring reliability and confidence to your software delivery lifecycle.

case_study.title: Enhancing Application Quality
case_study.summary: Implemented automated testing for a banking application, reducing critical bugs by 85% and accelerating release cycles.

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: Our teams engineer software that solves real-world problems and drives your business forward through innovation and performance.
services.detailed_description: We deliver innovative software tailored to complex business challenges using agile methodologies, clean code principles, and future-proof architectures.
benefits: Custom solutions aligned with business needs

case_study.title: Developing a Scalable CRM System
case_study.summary: Built a custom CRM platform for a sales organization, resulting in a 40% increase in lead conversion rates.

capabilities.title: Cloud Infrastructure
capabilities.description: Our cloud solutions enhance agility and scalability, helping you modernize your IT ecosystem securely and efficiently.
capabilities.detailed_description: We help businesses migrate to the cloud, set up secure infrastructure, and optimize workloads to harness the full potential of cloud computing while minimizing cost and downtime.

case_study.title: Hybrid Cloud Migration
case_study.summary: Migrated a legacy system to a hybrid AWS-Azure architecture, reducing costs by 40% and improving uptime.

capabilities.title: Functional Testing
capabilities.description: We ensure your software behaves as expected with thorough functional testing aligned with user stories and requirements.
capabilities.detailed_description: Our team performs end-to-end functional testing across web and mobile platforms to validate that applications meet business requirements and deliver a seamless user experience.

case_study.title: Regression Testing Automation
case_study.summary: Reduced QA cycle time by 50% by automating functional tests for a logistics platform.

capabilities.title: ADA Compliance & Accessibility Testing
capabilities.description: Ensure your digital platforms are inclusive and legally compliant with WCAG 2.1 and Section 508 standards.
capabilities.detailed_description: At Aloha Technologies and Management Consulting LLC, we are committed to building inclusive digital experiences. Our ADA compliance and accessibility testing services ensure that state applications and websites are accessible to users of all abilities. We conduct thorough evaluations using both automated and manual tools to identify and eliminate accessibility barriers, helping organizations meet compliance and enhance usability.
highlights: Keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility
Alt text validation and semantic HTML structure
Form labels, error messages, and focus indicators
Mobile accessibility and responsive layout testing

case_study.title: Accessibility Audit for State Services Portal
case_study.summary: Performed a full accessibility evaluation of a public services website, ensuring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and significantly improving screen reader navigation and keyboard usability.

capabilities.title: REST API Testing
capabilities.description: We validate the performance and reliability of APIs through robust testing strategies and automation frameworks.
capabilities.detailed_description: We offer complete API validation services that include functionality, security, performance, and reliability testing to ensure your backend services work as expected under various conditions.

case_study.title: API Test Suite for E-commerce
case_study.summary: Built a robust automated API testing framework reducing release validation time by 80%.

capabilities.cta_label: Test Your APIs the Smart Way

capabilities.title: Automation Frameworks
capabilities.description: Our reusable automation frameworks accelerate delivery cycles and ensure consistent quality in CI/CD pipelines.
capabilities.detailed_description: We design and implement scalable automation frameworks that integrate seamlessly with your development lifecycle, ensuring faster feedback and reliable deployments.
highlights: CI/CD integration with Jenkins or GitHub Actions

case_study.title: Reusable QA Framework for Finance App
case_study.summary: Decreased manual testing effort by 75% by building a scalable, reusable test framework for a fintech company.

capabilities.title: Performance & Load Testing
capabilities.description: We simulate real-world load scenarios to ensure your application scales and performs reliably under stress.
capabilities.detailed_description: Our performance engineering services help you identify and fix bottlenecks before they affect users, ensuring optimal performance under peak conditions.

case_study.title: High-Load Simulation for Public Portal
case_study.summary: Simulated 100,000 concurrent users for a government portal and improved throughput by 3x after analysis and tuning.

capabilities.title: Mobile Development
capabilities.description: We build seamless mobile applications tailored to your business needs on Android, iOS, and cross-platform frameworks.
capabilities.detailed_description: Our mobile development services enable organizations to connect with customers and employees through high-performance mobile applications. We design, develop, and deploy scalable and secure apps with responsive UX and native-like performance.
highlights: Native and cross-platform development (iOS, Android, Flutter)

case_study.title: Cross-Platform Field Service App
case_study.summary: Delivered a Flutter-based mobile app for a utilities company, improving field service reporting speed by 70%.

capabilities.cta_label: Build Your Mobile App with Us

industries.title: Healthcare
industries.description: We partner with healthcare providers and payers to improve care delivery through secure, compliant, and efficient digital solutions.
industries.detailed_description: Our healthcare solutions are designed to meet the evolving demands of care providers and payers. We focus on patient engagement, interoperability, compliance (HIPAA), and leveraging AI and analytics to enhance patient outcomes and operational efficiency.

case_study.title: Digitizing Patient Onboarding
case_study.summary: Helped a regional hospital system digitize patient onboarding, reducing wait times by 45% and improving patient satisfaction.

industries.title: Insurance
industries.description: We help insurers modernize operations, personalize customer experiences, and adopt data-driven decision making.
industries.detailed_description: Our insurance solutions empower carriers and agencies to streamline policy administration, enable self-service, and leverage predictive analytics to reduce risk and enhance underwriting precision.

case_study.title: AI in Claims Processing
case_study.summary: Reduced claim settlement time by 60% using machine learning algorithms for a mid-sized insurance provider.

industries.title: Life Sciences
industries.description: From clinical trials to supply chain digitization, we support life sciences organizations in transforming operations and outcomes.
industries.detailed_description: We work with pharmaceutical and biotech companies to digitize lab processes, enhance regulatory compliance, and improve collaboration across the research-to-commercialization lifecycle.

case_study.title: Accelerating Clinical Trials
case_study.summary: Enabled real-time data sharing and compliance automation for a global pharma firm, reducing trial timelines by 30%.

industries.title: Travel and Hospitality
industries.description: We enable travel brands to deliver seamless, personalized guest experiences through digital platforms and smart systems.
industries.detailed_description: Our solutions help travel and hospitality brands personalize experiences, streamline bookings, and optimize operations through data and automation. From hotel systems to airline platforms, we deliver frictionless journeys.

case_study.title: Smarter Hotel Stays
case_study.summary: Deployed a contactless check-in and smart room control platform for a hotel chain, improving NPS by 40%.
